App for iOS

While Ping Practice is tool agnostic, a series of experiments have led us to think an accessible and dedicated app for smartphone would be worthwhile —

We are currently developing a smartphone app for iOS. (We would like to extend this to Android eventually as well.)

Please be in touch if you would like to try the beta. In the meantime, we invite you to review this case study, published with the support of Apossible (April 2025).
